short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tune your YouTube recommendations with one click.
short.fr: Ajustez vos recommandations YouTube en un clic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it easier to tune your YouTube recommendations.

HOW  TO USE:
There will be a subtle grey box beside each video thumbnail while you browse.

1. Click the grey box to tell YouTube you are "Not Interested" in a video.

This will stop YouTube from recommending the video to you again, but it does not otherwise affect your recommendation algorithm.

2. Optionally, you can click one of the two icons that appear in the grey box to tell YouTube WHY you aren't interested in the video. This WILL help tune your recommendations.

- Click üëÄ for "Already Seen The Video"
- Click üëé for "Don't Like The Video"

At any point, you can click the "undo" button to undo your actions.
